description: Thinking about ditching the big wedding for something smaller, more meaningful, and totally you? You’re in the right place. This is where you’ll find real elopement stories that are intimate, emotional, and full of personality. As a Boston elopement photographer, I’ve captured everything from quiet “just us” ceremonies at City Hall to adventurous coastal elopements and chic micro weddings with a handful of your favorite people. Whether you're planning a spontaneous weekday ceremony or a thoughtfully styled elopement with all the personal touches, I’m here for the couples who want to do things differently. This page is full of inspiration for eloping in Massachusetts (or beyond), including location ideas, planning tips, and what it’s actually like to have a photographer who gets the low-key, high-feeling vibe you’re going for. You’ll also find LGBTQ+ elopements, second weddings, and creative alternatives to tradition, because love isn’t one-size-fits-all, and your wedding shouldn’t be either. So grab a coffee (or a cocktail) and start exploring how magical an elopement can be. If you're planning a city hall wedding, check out some of my planning guides: Boston City Hall wedding guide Cambridge City Hall wedding guide Best Elopement Location around Boston + Permit Info
name: Elopements
